About Me

Hi, My name is Edmond, a 22-year-old Full Stack Web Developer. I graduated in 2018 with a Bachelors of Science in Business Administration and Management Information Systems from the University at Buffalo in New York. The core of my skill set relies heavily upon the MERN stack, to be able to achieve a smooth and dynamic user experience. Currently some of my primary goals are to improve on my JavaScript and ReactJS capabilities. As well as dabble in some other frameworks like AngularJS to expand my tech stack and knowledge. When I'm not doing web development, I enjoy spending time with my lady and pupper, I also love cooking, fitness, video games, anime, geek stuff, learning about the latest technology, etc.

Contact Me

I'm currently pursuing new opportunities to learn more on how to improve my skill set. Do you have a project in mind that you'd like to get started with? Need my help or advice for something? Want to offer me advice and help instead? Fancy a conversation and a possible chance of coffee? Feel free to send me a message anytime, I will try my best to get back to you as soon as possible!
